tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DrugEfficacyFeedback (
  patient_id INT,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  efficacy_rate FLOAT,
  feedback TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE drug_feedback ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, drug_name VARCHAR(255), feedback_rating INT );
CREATE TABLE patient_info ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(255), dob DATE, gender VARCHAR(10), weight FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE efficacy_rates ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, efficacy_rate FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE drug_details ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, manufacture_date DATE, expiry_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    feedback_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_id INT,
    dosage_quantity FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    date_submitted DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);
